Ydrassil:

"We aren't kidding..."saqid ydrassil who had arrived some seconds 
before"We suffered an attack some days ago, a new maxmal named 
Malice was taken prisioner by Unicron's minions... situations is 
very dangerous even we forge an alliance with Preds but I don't 
trust them..."

OOC: His minions retreated and by now they're doing major reparations




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> Fortuneteller's jaw dropped, "UNICRON!!!!  THAT'S NOT
> EVEN FUNNY!!!!"  She certainly thought Seer or Deus
> would have informed her if the world-eating-world had
> returned.
> 
> OOC:  What is going on with him, give me some details?
> 
> --- robert riley <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> > Megatron Revived:
> >  
> > The femme shook the clone's hand.  He noted how
> > small her hand was to his, but he wasn't the average
> > transformer, and the thought entertained him enough
> > for a minute grin.
> > "I think it would be best to get to a base.  With
> > Unicron around, it is dangeous to remain out in the
> > open.  Perhaps my step sister could arrange
> > something with the Maximals."
> > He lead Fortuneteller to Organics and Ydrassil, to
> > see both the Maximal's reaction and speak with
> > Organics.
> > 
> > Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > Fortuneteller remembered her backstory, "I am
> > Fortuneteller, a High Priestess of the Gypsyions.  I
> > come seeking the one who will bring light to the
> > future."  She didn't dare mention what future in the
> > presence of both Maximals and Predicons, because
> > they
> > would have to believe drastically different things
> > for
> > her to survive.  She simply shook the heavily
> > armored
> > bots hand.
> > 
> > --- robert riley <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> > > Megatron Revived:
> > >  
> > > The Emperor clone was able to dodge the blast,
> > > diving to safety behind rocks.  He then went and
> > > recovered his weaponry; shield, sword, and fusion
> > > cannon.  Shaking the cobwebs free from his head,
> > he
> > > ventured back to the pilot.  Upon reaching her, he
> > > extended his left hand, a sign of diplomacy.
> > > "I see you too have recently arrived here.  I am
> > > Megatron Revived, that femme over there is my step
> > > sister Organics.  The other I do not know, a
> > Maximal
> > > I suppose.  What are you doing here, if you do not
> > > mind my inquiry."
> > > 
> > > Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > > The craft crashed downward against the rocks, and
> > > Fortuneteller was shaken, but knew what she had to
> > > do.
> > > "It will sound perfect, the crash severed a fuel
> > > line, causing an explosion."  She had been careful
> > > to
> > > make sure that she had no Deviner symbols on
> > > herself,
> > > or in the shuttle, but the technology might be
> > > different enough to hint at an unknown faction,
> > > rather
> > > than an un-allied transformer, and she couldn't
> > > allow
> > > that.
> > > 
> > > Her DNA scanners raced out, quickly giving her the
> > > form of a nearby sparrow.  She then set the
> > > self-destruct to fifteen seconds, and grabbed her
> > > bolts, staff, and communicator, the one item of
> > > Deviner technology she was allowed to have.  She
> > > plunged it into a compartment in her chest, and
> > > popped
> > > the cockpit open.
> > > 
> > > Racing out she shouted, "GET DOWN!"  and leaped
> > > behind
> > > a rock, as the ship exploded, not a huge
> > explosion,
> > > but enough to ensure there was nothing
> > identifiable.
> > > 
> > > --- robert riley <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> > > > Organics:
> > > >  
> > > > "Thank you," the valkyrie says before turning to
> > > the
> > > > craft and Megatron.
> > > > "Hello in there, are you alright?"
> > > > 
> > > > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > > Ydrasssil:
> > > > 
> > > > Ydrassil didn't know hat to think and sadi"Ok,
> > > I'll
> > > > do it for this 
> > > > time as you wish"
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley
> > > > <bustercross365@y...> 
> > > > wrote:
> > > > > Organics/ Megatron Revived:
> > > > >  
> > > > > "We'll find out when he finds out," Organics
> > > > said,"but right now, 
> > > > leave him alone."
> > > > >  
> > > > > Megatron Revived looked deep into the cockpit
> > of
> > > > the shuttle to 
> > > > see who or what was inside.  
> > > > > "Are you alright in there?" he shouted.
> > > > > 
> > > > > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > > > Ydrassil:
> > > > > 
> > > > > "Your Step-brother????"Ydrassil was surpriced
> > > and
> > > > said "What will 
> > > > > say Rodimus if he knew this???"
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley
> > > > <bustercross365@y...> 
> > > > > wrote:
> > > > > > Organics:
> > > > > >  
> > > > > > "But he is also my step brother!  I won't
> > lose
> > > > him again!"
> > > > > > Organics drew her rifle and took aim on
> > > > Ydrassil.
> > > > > > "Leave him alone." the femme said, tears
> > > rushing
> > > > down her face.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > > > > YDrassil:
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > "ORGANICS!!! I DONM'T KNOW HOW BUT IT'S
> > > MEGATRON
> > > > OR SWORN 
> > > > > > ENEMY!!!!"yelled Ydrassil while he tried to
> > > find
> > > > a way to shot 
> > > > him 
> > > > > > without hurt her
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley 
> > > > <bustercross365@y...> 
> > > > > > wrote:
> > > > > > > Organics/ Megatron Revived:
> > > > > > >  
> > > > > > > It took several seconds for it to
> > register. 
> > > > Megatron was 
> > > > back!  
> > > > > > Her step brother was revived!  She saw
> > > Yddrassil
> > > > open fire.
> > > > > > > "NO!  DON'T SHOOT!" the femme yelled as
> > she
> > > > flew to him and 
> > > > > tried 
> > > > > > to obstruct his line of fire.
> > > > > > >  
> > > > > > > Megatron Revived was busy pushing against
> > > the
> > > > shuttle when he 
> > > > > was 
> > > > > > struck in the back.  He glared down over his
> > > > shoulder, and saw 
> > > > two 
> > > > > > smaller robots below.  One was his step
> > sister
> > > > Organics, and she 
> > > > > was 
> > > > > > trying to keep the other from firing on him.
> > 
> > > He
> > > > turned his 
> > > > > > attention back to the shuttle and opened his
> > > > engines all the 
> > > > way, 
> > > > > > this shuttle was going to stop now.
> > > > > >
